name: excelling in
description:
Excelling in is an ambitious project for Outhouse Media and in mind we're going to be adding depth to the world of the dead and the undead. In this game the player will be in control of a group of people who have all been sacrificed. You are tasked with finding out how the priests in on it. As you delve deeper into this world it will become clearer and the pictures of your own death may become more apparent than ever. Excelling in is a dark, parable based game that we are a team of small independent developers working with some really talented writers. More information on the game can be found at http://excellingin.com!
The team has been playing a lot of games recently and have decided to do a little more serious writing, they are not currently working on anything if you are interested in reading more on the game, please visit http://weep.re/excellingin_tv_post as well! You can also follow our progress on our website and follow Outhouse Media on twitter. We hope that you will find Excelling in to be a fantastic game! We look forward to playing Excelling in at PAX East!
